snippet.title: PLAYTOWN GENESIS - Official Teaser
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM➤➤https://store.steampowered.com/app/3247150/Playtown_Genesis/?beta=1

Set in the 1960s, Playtown Genesis places you in the role of Doctor Clint, a newly hired scientist at the Eye Order, a secret underground facility with a dark history. Founded in the 1700s, the Eye Order was established as a sanctuary for sentient eyeballs powered by glowing crystals mined from nearby caves. These eerie beings have used the crystals to fuel their advanced laboratories, maintaining an iron grip over the facility for centuries.
As you begin your work, disturbing events unfold, revealing the Eye Order’s true nature. You discover a hidden rebellion within the facility, led by those who seek to overthrow Hexcor, the ruthless leader of the organization. Drawn into the conflict, you must navigate the terrifying corridors of the order, using stealth and wits to survive as you join the resistance and fight to bring down Hexcor’s oppressive regime.
